医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明感染 COVID-19 的儿童的隔离期较短学校政策要求患有 COVID-19 的学生离开教室五天就足够了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Research-suggests-shorter-isolation-periods-for-children-with-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Research-suggests-shorter-isolation-periods-for-children-with-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2249e30-532f-410d-a3a2-8ea17906a3a9 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 14:13:13 -0400 Research suggests shorter isolation periods for children with COVID-19
研究人员发现触发癌细胞程序性细胞死亡的新方法加州大学戴维斯分校综合癌症中心的一个研究小组在 CD95 受体上发现了一个可以导致细胞死亡的关键表位（可以激活较大蛋白质的蛋白质部分）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Researchers-discover-new-way-to-trigger-programmed-cell-death-in-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Researchers-discover-new-way-to-trigger-programmed-cell-death-in-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6f5aebb-ac88-49c7-91db-0621a85417a2 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 14:07:37 -0400 Researchers discover new way to trigger programmed cell death in cancer cells
先天免疫力减弱可能会增加患严重 COVID-19 的风险在严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 感染期间，激活的巨噬细胞、树突状细胞、中性粒细胞和自然杀伤细胞是抵御感染的第一道防御。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Weakened-innate-immunity-may-increase-risk-of-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Weakened-innate-immunity-may-increase-risk-of-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d60ab00-eaec-4b0e-8b70-307705e5d08c Tue, 24 Oct 2023 13:53:43 -0400 Weakened innate immunity may increase risk of severe COVID-19
研究揭示肺离子细胞在肺功能中的意想不到的作用爱荷华大学研究人员的一项新研究发现，被称为肺离子细胞的稀有肺细胞有助于从气道表面吸收水和盐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-unexpected-role-of-pulmonary-ionologies-in-lung-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-unexpected-role-of-pulmonary-ionologies-in-lung-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f56c68d-0e2f-44ac-b17d-be0bdbefc8ae Tue, 24 Oct 2023 13:37:05 -0400 Study reveals unexpected role of pulmonary ionocytes in lung function
新辅助派姆单抗在超过一半的可切除黑色素瘤患者中实现了主要病理缓解在对 III-IV 期可切除黑色素瘤患者的 SWOG S1801 试验结果进行探索性分析时，研究人员发现，从接受过新辅助（术前）派姆单抗治疗的患者身上采集的手术标本中，有一半以上出现了重大病理反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Neoadjuvant-pembrolizumab-achieves-major-pathologic-response-in-more-than-half-of-患者-with-resectable-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Neoadjuvant-pembrolizumab-achieves-major-pathologic-response-in-more-than-half-of-患者-with-resectable-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddb852fc-1b52-40e4-b71a-307e5ef855bc Tue, 24 Oct 2023 13:11:31 -0400 Neoadjuvant pembrolizumab achieves major pathologic response in more than half of patients with resectable melanoma
研究揭示肠道真菌在严重 COVID-19 和长期 COVID 中的作用威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会医院的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，某些肠道真菌在严重的 COVID-19 病例中会大量繁殖，加剧导致​​这种疾病的过度炎症，同时还会导致免疫系统发生长期变化。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-sheds-light-on-role-of-gut-fungi-in-severe-COVID-19-and-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-sheds-light-on-role-of-gut-fungi-in-severe-COVID-19-and-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0dd8251-58a5-4e19-a0aa-35cdd5b1aa8b Tue, 24 Oct 2023 12:54:11 -0400 Study sheds light on role of gut fungi in severe COVID-19 and long COVID
辛辛那提大学癌症中心获得美国癌症协会机构研究资助美国癌症协会授予辛辛那提大学癌症中心机构研究补助金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/University-of-Cincinnati-Cancer-Center-receives-Institutional-Research-Grant-from-American-Cancer-Society.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/University-of-Cincinnati-Cancer-Center-receives-Institutional-Research-Grant-from-American-Cancer-Society.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c7a801f-0503-4107-ae52-dff721c68f1e Tue, 24 Oct 2023 12:34:19 -0400 University of Cincinnati Cancer Center receives Institutional Research Grant from American Cancer Society
新的“伪细胞”制剂可能彻底改变玻璃体视网膜疾病的治疗中国科学院过程工程研究所（IPE）和北京朝阳医院的研究人员开发了一种基于自愈微胶囊负载外泌体的新型“伪细胞”制剂，用于治疗多种玻璃体视网膜疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-pseudo-cell-formulation-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-vitreoretinal-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-pseudo-cell-formulation-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-vitreoretinal-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0cb1727-630b-40dd-a39c-4a2cac31f1d3 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 12:20:29 -0400 New "pseudo cell" formulation could revolutionize treatment of vitreoretinal diseases
新方法为大脑去甲肾上腺素系统提供了有价值的见解一个国际研究小组对大脑的去甲肾上腺素（NA）系统提供了宝贵的见解，该系统长期以来一直是治疗注意力缺陷/多动症、抑郁症和焦虑症药物的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-method-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-brains-noradrenaline-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-method-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-brains-noradrenaline-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ec2cf72-cb80-439f-a069-e4559085a4bd Tue, 24 Oct 2023 12:11:44 -0400 New method provides valuable insights into the brain's noradrenaline system
研究揭示了一些局灶性癫痫儿童大脑嵌合的另一个起源对于大多数人来说，体内的每个细胞都包含相同的遗传信息。然而，有时人们可能有两组或更多组基因不同的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-an-alternate-origin-of-brain-mosaicism-in-some-children-with-focal-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-an-alternate-origin-of-brain-mosaicism-in-some-children-with-focal-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6da30d14-d3e3-4f80-981f-05a26bb36813 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 11:54:07 -0400 Study reveals an alternate origin of brain mosaicism in some children with focal epilepsy
